thread.title: New England Patriots, Atlanta Falcons release inactive lists for Super Bowl LI
thread.title_full: New England Patriots, Atlanta Falcons release inactive lists for Super Bowl LI

title: New England Patriots, Atlanta Falcons release inactive lists for Super Bowl LI
text:
— Atlanta Falcons (@AtlantaFalcons) February 5, 2017 
As for the Patriots, Michael Floyd is the most notable inactive, despite the fact that he was expected to be all week. 
— New England Patriots (@Patriots) February 5, 2017 
His role for the Patriots the past two weeks was being a “scout-team Julio Jones,” helping New England’s defense prepare for what they’ll see from the All-Pro receiver on Sunday. Michael Floyd was one of the players who served as scout-team Julio Jones this week. He will not play today. https://t.co/xYnbx0Iqdo 
— Mike Garafolo (@MikeGarafolo) February 5, 2017 
It should be a great game, as both teams have their top players healthy and good to go in Houston.
